vlive.korean: 더 해 주고 싶어하는 로맨티스트의 당신. you are a romantic person who never forgets about anniversaries. 듣기 View video BTOB : <프니엘 'THAT GIRL' 런칭 전야제>
vlive.english: you are a romantic person who never forgets about anniversaries.

examples.korean: Despite what many romantics believe, the photo was staged and not spontaneous. 발음듣기 많은 로맨티스트들의 바람과 달리, 이 사진은 우연의 결과물이 아닌 연출된 모습이다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Despite what many romantics believe, the photo was staged and not spontaneous. 발음

examples.korean: For all the romanticists out there, it will close an hour later on Friday and Saturday. 발음듣기 로맨티스트를 위해서, 링크는 금요일과 토요일에는 한 시간 늦게 문을 닫습니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: For all the romanticists out there, it will close an hour later on Friday and Saturday. 발음
